definition: By Possession is meant a country which is held by no other title than mere conquest. In this sense Possession differs from Dependency, which belongs rightfully to the country which has dominion over it; and from Colony, which is a country settled by citizens or subjects of the mother country (https://legal-dictionary.thefreedictionary.com/possession)
